response.original_title: Only the Names Have Been Changed to Protect the Animals
response.overview: Jim Doyle is a social worker whose cases are anything but... He is seen visiting 3 different (all true in their own way) examples of the kooky world we live in. From the 8 year old girl who keeps a pony as a pet on the 18th floor of a block of flats, to the man who thinks the hyena he has bought is "just a puppy". This wry look at the life of a Liverpool Social Worker rightly disappeared with out trace.
response.title: Only the Names Have Been Changed to Protect the Animals
